title: Live in the ❤ of Issaquah! Open One Bedroom Available Now
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 80', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 561-594 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Self Guided, Touchless & Virtual Tours Available Now!', 'Vale Apartments is a new boutique community featuring unique amenities in the heart of downtown Issaquah.', 'With a walk score of 76, Vale offers a dynamic mix of retail, restaurants, and inviting outdoor spaces all only a few steps away.', 'Vale is located on the Juniper Trail, so residents can enjoy a convenient 5 minute bike ride or a 12 minute walk to the Issaquah Park-n-Ride as well as beautifully landscaped parks within 1/4 mile for your furry friends.', "Issaquah is the gateway to big city amenities and mountain recreation, all outside Vale's doorstep.", 'In this Built Green 4-Star building, select between a variety of studio, one, and two bedroom floor plans.', 'Designer finishes include quartz counter tops, ceramic back splashes and luxury plank flooring.', 'All homes come with free WiFi as well.', 'Community WiFi available in all areas.', 'A Variety of sizes and layouts, our floor plans offer thoughtful design for the modern way of life.', 'Residents will be able to enjoy two entertaining rooftop decks, a convenient rooftop pea patch, an expansive lounge with full gourmet kitchen, and a top of the line fitness center.', 'Vale also has an elegant grand lobby where residents can relax and unwind by the fireplace.', 'With convenient access to the Juniper Train, Vale features a vast bike room with a work station, for our avid multi-modal residents.', 'Features:', 'All the features and amenities of a full size one bedroom in a studio.', 'Private bedroom with full closet.', 'Full size kitchen and living space.', 'Over sized windows that offer an abundance of natural lighting as well as LED lighting throughout.', "You won't believe you're in a studio!", 'Community Amenities:', 'Enjoy this multi-purpose space to play games, enjoy movies with friends or host a party.', "Free WiFi., On those days you can't go for a hike or take a ride.", "You'll love the convenience.", "Free WiFi., BIKE ROOM, THE NEST, With convenient access to the Juniper Trail, Vale features a vast bike room with a work station, for our avid multi-modal tenants., ROOFTOP DECK, From this vantage point you'll love to BBQ, garden in the community pea patch or sit by a fire to take in the territorial views.", 'Free WiFi., FITNESS CENTER', 'Pet Policy', 'Breed restrictions', 'Dogs allowed $50 pet rent', 'Cats allowed $35 pet rent', '2 pet maximum', 'Pet deposit per animal $200', 'Pet fee per animal $300', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.', "If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.", 'Please contact our leasing team with any questions.', 'ZWWm13IeUP']
